main_definition: Juice refers to the liquid extracted from fruits or vegetables, often consumed as a beverage.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of drink made by squeezing fruit, typically served cold
meanings_and_examples.example: I had an orange juice for breakfast this morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term used to describe a person's feelings or emotions when they are excited or enthusiastic about something
meanings_and_examples.example: He really got all the juice out of that story, he was laughing so hard!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical term used to describe taking advantage of a situation or getting more than what is fair
meanings_and_examples.example: When they realized their mistake, it felt like everyone had already taken the juice.
